name: Crossout: Corrida Pack
summary: This pack includes: Unique armored car: Corrida; Weapons: Cricket 1M Unique cabin Torero Unique hero portrait: Jose Ortega; Unique decor: Muleta Wing, Corno Destro, Corno Sinistro; Unique sticker: Mad bull; Unique paint can: El Dorado; Increases the maximum number of parts used to 55;1500 in-game coins.
